Collateral Agreementis a draft collateral agreement for discusion at the next meeting We attempted to develop one that was simple and not onerous to comply with I expect to send out a note shortly announcing that the next meeting will be at the Broadmoor in Colorado Springs on August Security Agreementdoc

August Meetinghave set up a meeting at the Broadmoor Hotel in Colorado Springs The Broadmoor Hotel Lake Avenue Colorado Springs CO The meeting will run from am pm on August Please note that the WSPP has guaranteed rooms at the rate of night Other rooms will also be available You need to reserve by July or the WSPP will be charged Please refer to the Western Systems Power Pool in making your arrangements

WSPP Contracting MeetingJanuary will be a WSPP Contracting meeting on January at the following hotel which is located near the San Francisco airport Sheraton Gateway Hotel Airport Boulevard Burlingame CA The meeting will start at am and end at pm My initial list of agenda items includes How to deal with regulatory risks of retroactive price changes Cal ISO market definition How to facilitate using the WSPP Agreement for Eastern markets to reduce credit risks Retail customers as members Financial products under agreement Waiver of common law impossibilityimpracticability arguments Language to clarify service companies as agents Additional forms of documents to be attached to agreement Please let me know by December whether you have any additional agenda items so that I can send out an agenda well in advance of the meeting Email me at Please also note that I expect that we will need to hold another meeting before the Operating Committee meeting I would propose Feb or another day around that time in a warm weather spot The following Monday is a holiday

Draft agendafollowing is a draft agenda for the meeting in St Louis on May Provisions or changes to address governmental actions ProductsAdditional products Cal ISO definition Indemnification Floating price language CollateralSecurity interest language Offsets involving all agreements between the parties in the event of a default Clarifications re offsets Master netting agreement Suspension in event of nonperformance Market price calculation clarification Choice of law Form of credit support annex If you have other issues please let me know ASAP for a final agenda

Conference Call RescheduledThe conference call previously scheduled for December is rescheduled for December am EST because December th is a major FERC meeting day PLEASE NOTE THE NEW CALL IN NUMBER Chairperson Mike Small Call in Confirmation If you have not already sent my secretary Winnie Howard your RSVP for participating in the conference call please do so
